com.aloqa.trax.shared.saps
Class HandleManager

java.lang.Object
  com.aloqa.trax.shared.saps.HandleManager

public class HandleManager
extends java.lang.Object

Use this class to retrieve a unique TraXHandle, which is needed to access the TraXAPI_SAP_App - interface.

public HandleManager()
Method Detail

createHandle

public TraXHandle createHandle()
Creates and returns a TraXHandle that is unique within this JVM.

Returns:
A newly generated TraXHandle.

createHandle

public TraXHandle createHandle(java.lang.String nonce)
Creates and returns a TraXHandle that is unique within this JVM. Use this method if, for some reason, the resulting TraXHandle must be unique even over the bundaries of this JVM. For this purpose the provided nonce is appended to the id of the generated TraXHandle.
Normally, this method is not needed within the mobile TraX APIs, but may be used without problems.

Parameters:
nonce - A String that is appended to the id of the generated TraXHandle.
Returns:
A newly generated TraXHandle.

destroyHandle

public void destroyHandle(java.lang.String id)
Destroys the TraXHandle with the given id and frees all associated ressources.

Parameters:
id - The id of the TraXHandle to destroy.

lookupHandle

public TraXHandle lookupHandle(java.lang.String id)
Returns a reference to the TraXHandle with the given id.

Parameters:
id - The id of the TraXHandle to lookup.
Returns:
The TraXHandle associated with the given id, null if no such TraXHandle can be found.
